channel.title: ScanX – Stocks
channel.description: ScanX stock market news (Full-Text RSS compatible)

item.title: Top News Heritage Foods Executive Director Mrs. Nara Brahmani Honored at Business Today Awards 2025 4 minutes ago Heritage Foods Limited announced that Mrs. Nara Brahmani, Executive Director, won at the Business Today Most Powerful Women in Business Awards 2025 held on December 12, 2025, in Mumbai. The awards celebrate exceptional women leaders in business and society, with this year's theme being 'Profit is Power.' The recognition highlights Mrs. Brahmani's visionary leadership and dedication to social causes.
item.description: Top News Heritage Foods Executive Director Mrs. Nara Brahmani Honored at Business Today Awards 2025 4 minutes ago Heritage Foods Limited announced that Mrs. Nara Brahmani, Executive Director, won at the Business Today Most Powerful Women in Business Awards 2025 held on December 12, 2025, in Mumbai. The awards celebrate exceptional women leaders in business and society, with this year's theme being 'Profit is Power.' The recognition highlights Mrs. Brahmani's visionary leadership and dedication to social causes.

item.title: Pre-Market Setup: Global Cues and Key Factors Shaping Today's Session 3 hours ago GIFT Nifty up 0.18% at 26,058, hinting at a positive start. US markets closed lower, with NASDAQ down 1.69%. Asian markets mixed. Commodities show strength with gold up 0.64% and crude oil rising 0.63%. USD/INR stable at 90.54. FIIs net sellers, DIIs net buyers. Notable block deals in Usha Martin Ltd, with Peterhouse Investments reducing stake.
item.description: Pre-Market Setup: Global Cues and Key Factors Shaping Today's Session 3 hours ago GIFT Nifty up 0.18% at 26,058, hinting at a positive start. US markets closed lower, with NASDAQ down 1.69%. Asian markets mixed. Commodities show strength with gold up 0.64% and crude oil rising 0.63%. USD/INR stable at 90.54. FIIs net sellers, DIIs net buyers. Notable block deals in Usha Martin Ltd, with Peterhouse Investments reducing stake.

item.title: Corona Remedies Makes Strong Market Debut with 38% Premium 1 hour ago Corona Remedies, a pharmaceutical company, listed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) at ₹1,470.00, marking a 38.42% premium over its IPO price of ₹1,062.00. The strong debut reflects positive investor sentiment towards the company and the pharmaceutical sector. This successful listing may boost confidence in upcoming IPOs, particularly in the healthcare space.
item.description: Corona Remedies Makes Strong Market Debut with 38% Premium 1 hour ago Corona Remedies, a pharmaceutical company, listed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) at ₹1,470.00, marking a 38.42% premium over its IPO price of ₹1,062.00. The strong debut reflects positive investor sentiment towards the company and the pharmaceutical sector. This successful listing may boost confidence in upcoming IPOs, particularly in the healthcare space.

item.title: Matrimony.com Approves Share Buyback at ₹655 Per Share Through Tender Offer 38 minutes ago Matrimony.com has approved a share buyback program through a tender offer mechanism, setting the repurchase price at ₹655.00 per share. Shareholders can voluntarily participate in the program, offering them an opportunity to sell their holdings back to the company at the predetermined price. The tender offer structure allows eligible shareholders to decide whether to retain their shares or participate in the buyback.
item.description: Matrimony.com Approves Share Buyback at ₹655 Per Share Through Tender Offer 38 minutes ago Matrimony.com has approved a share buyback program through a tender offer mechanism, setting the repurchase price at ₹655.00 per share. Shareholders can voluntarily participate in the program, offering them an opportunity to sell their holdings back to the company at the predetermined price. The tender offer structure allows eligible shareholders to decide whether to retain their shares or participate in the buyback.
